headline.main: Fighting Modern-Day Witch Hunts in India’s Remote Northeast

snippet: Birubala Rabha, an activist, works with state legislators and residents of rural villages in Assam State to end the practice of punishing women accused of witchcraft.
lead_paragraph: Birubala Rabha, an activist, works with state legislators and residents of rural villages in Assam State to end the practice of punishing women accused of witchcraft.
